reviewText: John Hart and Lon Chaney work great together
it is ok and on time

I bought the first 5 volumes of this TV series (a total of 20 episodes).  A true "Blast from the past!"  In addition to the interesting shows themselves, I've been surprised by seeing some actors & actresses who later became quite famous.

This is a great movie collection watched it when I was a young kid and its as good now as it was back then.  I rate it 5 stars and if you or your kids haven't watched get a copy and enjoy.  Great collector addition and happy to have it in our collection.
It is an old film, but great to see it!  I am trying to find Vol. 6.  Maybe someone out there has one.
Great series.  Wish it had more episodes!  There could have been a lot , more episodes.  I wish more older shows were available.
